data.title: Alabama Trucker Magazine - Alabama Trucking Association
data.meta_description: Alabama Trucker is the official publication of the Alabama Trucking Association offering news and events for the state's trucking community.
data.text:
Alabama Trucker Magazine: Telling the stories of Alabama Trucking

Alabama Trucker is the official publication of the Alabama Trucking Association with the sole mission to tell the many great stories of the state’s commercial trucking community. For 50+ years, this award-winning trade publication has documented and promoted our Association’s activities and mission, celebrated professional commercial drivers and the fleet managers and business owners who make our community so special.

Alabama Trucker is published quarterly, distributed to more than 2,500 trucking professionals, including commercial drivers, trucking executives, fleet managers, industry safety and maintenance professionals, federal and state regulatory officials, and political figures. Our goal is to ensure our readers understand and value the ideals and issues that matter most to Alabama’s vast trucking community.

Advertising Opportunities

Want to reach 2,500+ decision-makers at nearly 700 Alabama-based trucking businesses? Consider advertising in Alabama Trucker to reach the most concentrated readership of trucking professionals in the state. Our rates are affordable, and on top of that, you’re helping us showcase what makes the trucking industry so vital to the state’s economy.

For more information, contact managing editor Ford Boswell at ford@tracktmedia.com or 334-834-3983.

To download a 2024 Advertising Rate Card, CLICK HERE.
